page.title: 06BASSETT 2
page.content: (Transport) The Bassett area is crossed by a number of main routes, for example, the Winchester Road which leads out of Southampton towards Winchester, and Burgess Road which forms part of a ring road system. All the main roads are used by a number bus routes. (Health) There was a dentist's surgery near the shops and a doctor's surgery placed in a lousing area. A centre for the Blind serves the whole area and there are two Old Peoples' homes. (Education and Recreation) There are only two schools in this area. Vermont school is a primary school but Red Lodge school serves pupils with special needs from all the city. There are tennis courts, a cricket ground and a running track.
